title: Gemini 3 Flash Now Available
description: Windsurf added Gemini 3 Flash model which combines Gemini 3 Pro-grade reasoning with Flash-level speed and efficiency, achieving 78% on SWE-bench Verified coding benchmark. Features 3x faster performance than previous generations with superior coding intelligence and deep multimodal understanding.

community_feedback.quote: Don't let the 'flash' name fool you, this is an amazing [model]
Gemini 3 Flash feels like a real milestone - praising speed, intelligence, and low cost
Impressed by the intelligence and speed, fixed an issue that gpt-5.1-codex couldn't
Some reports of 'loss of context' in longer conversations
Insane speed in coding and visual tasks, cost-effective alternative to larger models

title: v0.86.0 - GPT-5 and New Model Support
description: Added support for all GPT-5 models, Grok-4 via xAI and OpenRouter, Gemini 2.5 Flash Lite Preview. Improved /clear and /undo commands, display model announcements, and various bug fixes. Aider wrote 88% of the code in this release.

community_feedback.quote: Aider wrote 88% of the code in this release - significant milestone showing AI's capability in self-development
GPT-5-Thinking-Mini is the all-around best balance as to quality and speed of the responses
GPT-5 is the strongest coding model we've ever released, outperforms o3 across coding benchmarks
Some initial issues with temperature parameter errors with GPT-5, addressed in subsequent fixes

title: Wave 13: Merry Shipmas - Multi-Agent Sessions & Git Worktrees
description: Wave 13 brings first-class support for parallel, multi-agent sessions in Windsurf, along with Git worktrees, side-by-side Cascade panes and tabs, and a dedicated terminal profile for more reliable agent execution. SWE-1.5 is now free for all users for 3 months.

community_feedback.quote: Windsurf is actually great - comparing favorably to Copilot and Kiro, citing better pricing and value
First-class support for parallel multi-agent sessions is a game changer

title: Layout Customization and Stability Improvements
description: Holiday release focused entirely on fixing bugs and improving stability. Includes improvements to core agent, layout controls with four default layouts (agent, editor, zen, browser), viewing code diffs, and keyboard shortcuts for layout switching.

community_feedback.quote: After each update, the Agent Mode seems to be forced as the default layout, and I have to manually switch back
I feel like the Cursor team is putting too much effort into UI adjustments. The layout keeps getting rearranged
Our goal is to make it easy to customize your default layout, and which panes you want open
